div.head: 咽喉口齒病
div.div: diseases of the throat the mouth and the teeth

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: diseases of the throat the mouth and the teeth

sense.def: Alternative Names yan hou kou chi zhu bing 咽喉口齒諸病. Pathological Condition Combined Designation of diseases affecting the throat, the oral cavity, and the teeth. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry huang hua liao 黃花了 quoting Ben cao tu jing 本草圖經 : 療咽喉口齒 , “It cures throat, mouth and teeth”, writes: 療咽喉口齒病效 , “It effectively cures diseases of the throat, the mouth and the teeth ”.
